double_crochet into the very 1st st place a sm to keep track double_crochet across turn 63 r3 chain 1 and work 1 single_crochet into the very 1st st place a sm to keep track single_crochet across turn 63 repeat r2 and r3 for a total of 65 row you will end on a single_crochet row do not cut yarn border instructions please note you are working in the round so you don t have to turn your work when you finish the round round 1 chain 1 and work single_crochet evenly around the entire blanket work 3 single_crochet in each corner slip_stitch to the top of the first stitch to join cut ya and attach yb round 2 chain 1 and work single_crochet in each stitch around the blanket work 3 single_crochet in each corner slip_stitch to the top of the first stitch to join cut yarn and weave ends make 4 pompoms following the instructions above and attach them into each corner of the blanket the chart below provides stitch counts and yarn yardage for different sizes baby size finished measurements width = 75 cm 29 5 inches length = 95 cm 37 4 inches starting chain 64 number of row 65 yarn yardage 430 m 470 2 yards of chunky weigth yarn ya 23 m 25 1 yards of yarn in contrasting colour of the same weight yb
